name: Desastres de la Guerra
description:
Desastres de la Guerra is a fever dream about the terrors of war. It is an artistic speculation that uses AI generated text interpolated with nightmarish visual compositions inspired by Francisco de Goya series of the same name, that the player has to travers. It is a frozen moment in time, that is interpolated with artefacts of war and destructions from the world of digital games and classical visual art.

Design & Concept: Georg Hobmeier

Design & Development: Victor Morales

Music samples generously provided by Hektor Castillo

Produced & financed by gold extra
